AuthenticationFailure: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_AuthenticationFailure','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
TopSecurityEvents: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_TopSecurityEvents','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
AuthenticationSuccess: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_AuthenticationSuccess','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
CREEvents: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_CREEvents','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
VPNAccess: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_VPNAccess','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
UBA: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_UBA','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
GroupModification: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_GroupModification','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
GroupModificationAzureActiveDirectory: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_GroupModificationAzureActiveDirectory','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
InteractiveLogonType2And10: SELECT * FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_InteractiveLogon','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}'
AllowedInboundTraffic: SELECT DOMAINNAME(domainId) AS domainName, domainId AS 'Domain', eventCount  AS  'Event Count', sourceIP  AS 'Source IP', destinationPort  AS  'Destination Port', "Rule Name" as 'Rule Name (custom)', destinationIP  AS  'Destination IP', LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype) AS 'Log Source Type', startTime AS 'Start Time', FULLNETWORKNAME(destinationip, domainId) as 'Destination Network', FULLNETWORKNAME(SourceIP, DomainID)  AS  'Source Network', sourcePort  AS  'Source Port' FROM events WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' AND ((destinationport NOT IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 43, 161, 162) AND ((highlevelcategory = 4000 AND category IN (4002, 4007, 4012, 4016, 4025, 4027, 4031, 4037, 4039))) AND NOT (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',sourceip) OR INCIDR('0.0.0.0/8',sourceip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', sourceip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', sourceip) OR INCIDR('169.254.0.0/16', sourceip) OR INCIDR ('127.0.0.0/8', sourceip)) AND (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',destinationip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', destinationip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', destinationip)) AND FULLNETWORKNAME(sourceip, domainId) = 'other' AND LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype) != 'Custom Rule Engine' AND NOT referencesetcontains('Known DNS traffic', destinationIP))) START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}' PARAMETERS REMOTESERVERS=ARIELSERVERS4EPNAME(PROCESSORNAME({event_processor}))
AllowedOutboundTraffic: SELECT DOMAINNAME(domainId) AS domainName,domainId AS 'Domain', eventCount  AS  'Event Count', destinationIP  AS  'Destination IP', destinationPort  AS  'Destination Port', "Rule Name" as 'Rule Name (custom)', LOGSOURCENAME(logSourceId) AS 'Log Source', LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype) AS 'Log Source Type', sourceIP  AS  'Source IP', startTime  AS  'Start Time', FULLNETWORKNAME(SourceIP, DomainID)  AS  'Source Network', QIDNAME(qid)  AS  'Event Name', destinationGeographicLocation AS 'Destination Geographic Country/Region', Action, "Policy Name", "Mitre Tactic" AS 'Mitre Tactic', "Mitre Technique" AS 'Mitre Technique' FROM events WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' AND ((destinationport NOT IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 43, 161, 162) AND ((highlevelcategory = 4000 AND category IN (4002, 4007, 4012, 4016, 4025, 4027, 4031, 4037, 4039))) AND (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',sourceip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', sourceip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', sourceip)) AND NOT (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',destinationip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', destinationip) OR INCIDR('0.0.0.0/8', destinationip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', destinationip) OR INCIDR('169.254.0.0/16', destinationip) OR INCIDR('127.0.0.0/8', destinationip)) AND FULLNETWORKNAME(destinationip, domainId) = 'other' AND LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype) != 'Custom Rule Engine' AND NOT referencesetcontains('Known DNS traffic', destinationIP))) START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}' PARAMETERS REMOTESERVERS=ARIELSERVERS4EPNAME(PROCESSORNAME({event_processor}))
